about_the_game:
the haunted farm it's RPG platformer horror game 2d animation by hand
you have help ali to get out from the haunted farm and get keys to open doors of the haunted farm

and runway form it you can walk and run and fight with enemy and pass to next level
you have save battery you need to keep your flashlight work for see on the dark
detailed_description:
the haunted farm it's RPG platformer horror game 2d animation by hand
you have help ali to get out from the haunted farm and get keys to open doors of the haunted farm

and runway form it you can walk and run and fight with enemy and pass to next level
you have save battery you need to keep your flashlight work for see on the dark

O POTREBBE NON ESSERE ADEGUATO PER LA VISIONE SUL LAVORO

OR MAY NOT BE APPROPRIATE FOR VIEWING AT WORK

cero.descriptors:
このゲームには、すべての年齢層に不適切なコンテンツが含まれている可能性があります。
または、職場での閲覧には適切ではない可能性があります

short_description: The story goes around an Ali he's friends challenged him to visit an abandoned place called the haunted farm. To prove to them that everything goes and people say about that place is just rumours. But.. the unexpected happened when fall in to a world of illusion by visiting that mysterious place
